lines.text: This document provides a comprehensive specification for
the next generation platform. It covers architecture
decisions, API design, security requirements, and
The system follows a microservices architecture with the
API Gateway — handles authentication and rate limiting
User Service — manages user accounts and permissions
Order Service — processes orders and payments
Notification Service — sends emails and push
Analytics Service — collects and processes usage
All APIs follow RESTful conventions with JSON payloads.
The platform must meet the following security standards:
All data at rest must be encrypted using AES-256
All data in transit must use TLS 1.3
Role-based access control (RBAC) for all endpoints
Audit logging for all state mutations
Rate limiting at the API gateway level
The system will be deployed on Kubernetes with the
All services emit structured logs, metrics, and
distributed traces. A centralized observability stack
This specification provides the foundation for the next
generation of our platform. All teams should review and
provide feedback by end of Q1 2026.
